cancellationpolicies.text: Please note that this room is non-refundable and non-amendable. If the booking is cancelled, no money will be refunded.

booking.bookedBy: TEST BOOKING, VOUCHER NOT VALID FOR USE. SunHotels T: 0034 971 425588 Booking reference: TESTXML

hotelNote.text: Car park NO. Check-in hour - .Please note that guest may pay extra taxes on spot which are not included in the price. Breakfast included up to 2 adults sharing the same room. Extra guests staying in this room must pay their breakfast at the hotel.
Please note a minimum age requirement applies to most US hotels. In many hotels the primary guest must be at least 21 years of age on the day of check-in.
